page.title: 20Church & Chapel, Elburton
page.content: The Methodist Chapel is situated in the village. The foundation stone was laid in 1869. As you go into the chapel there is a vestry and a creche for the under 3 year olds. The chapel will seat about 110 people. The renovated chapel and the new vestry were opened on Saturday, December 5th,1931. The chapel is now raising funds for another extension which will seat 60 more people. St Matthews church, Elburton is situated roughly opposite the school. St Matthews church was built in 1922. Before the church was built there was an orchard on the site. The church will seat about 350 people. Both churches have halls which are used by community organizations. Unusually the Methodist church is older than the Parish church of Elburton.
